message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Let's compromise, Bob. I'll take a little less this time, but I think it's a fair deal for both of us.
I'll meet you halfway between my last offer and your last offer.
Okay, Bob. This is my final offer. I'm willing to give you a bit more this time, but I won't budge any further.
